backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user roles, services, projects, CRM entities, orders, and other business data with access control and inâ€‘memory map-based state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/UX requirements to frontend files, components, and associated tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-written summaries describing purposes of all major frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind and OKLCH variable definitions for theming, including dark mode tokens and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry file containing an empty React mount point and script loader for the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup handling authentication, profile bootstrap logic, and route definitions wrapped in the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentials.ts: Static demo login credentials with a helper function for validating email/password combinations.
frontend/src/auth/useSession.ts: React hook for storing and restoring demo login session data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: Shopping cart hook with localStorage persistence supporting add, remove, quantity updates, and total calculation.
High-level layout component combining background mesh, sidebar, top navigation, and a scrollable content container.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Sidebar navigation component that filters menu items by user role and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing notifications, user info, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity authentication and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/marketplace/servicesCatalog: Static list of default service offerings with names and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays an analytics dashboard with revenue, clients, conversion rate, and top service stats using card widgets.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationPage.tsx: Shows a list of automation tools with toggle switches, each described in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management, quantity updates, totals, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow by generating Stripe sessions and showing an order summary with GST.
Shows a placeholder onboarding form within a simple card layout.
frontend/src/pages/CRMPage.tsx: Fetches CRM activities and displays them grouped by sales pipeline stages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user-specific dashboard metrics like revenue, projects, and orders, with role-based project info.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorsPage.tsx: Lists rule-based business generators such as proposals, pricing, and follow-up tools in card format.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Renders lead management UI with lead creation form and CSV export functionality using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Displays required legal documents and their content, showing placeholders if missing.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles demo login, Internet Identity auth, and user profile setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure message with navigation options back to cart or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Lists all orders with amounts and payment statuses using fetched order data.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears cart after successful payment and displays confirmation with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a project's details, including status and service ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows a list of projects for the authenticated client or an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays service details and tiered pricing, allowing users to add plans to their cart.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all services from backend or defaults, showing tier pricing and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin-only settings page that shows an access denied message for non-admins and displays a placeholder admin panel card for configuration.
frontend/src/payments/useCreateCheckoutS: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to create a Stripe checkout session and validates the returned session URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, radius, fonts, and animations with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the SaaS dashboard goals, constraints, required images, and implemented features.
